Particles.point: ちゃいけない / じゃいけない
Particles.example: [translate:ネクタイをしちゃいけない。] (Nekutai o shicha ikenai. - You must not wear a necktie.)

Particles.meaning: To be (am, is, are, were, used to)
Particles.example: [translate:私はクリスです。] (Watashi wa Kurisu desu. - I am Chris.)
[translate:一人だけ。] (Hitori dake. - Only one person.)
[translate:明日は雨だろう。] (Ashita wa ame darou. - It will probably rain tomorrow.)

Particles.meaning: In, at, on, by, with, via
Particles.example: [translate:学校で勉強する。] (Gakkou de benkyou suru. - I study at school.)
[translate:犬が好きです。でも猫も好きです。] (Inu ga suki desu. Demo neko mo suki desu. - I like dogs. But I also like cats.)

Particles.meaning: I think it seems probably right?
Particles.example: [translate:先生は来るでしょう。] (Sensei wa kuru deshou. - The teacher will probably come.)
[translate:どうして来なかったの？] (Doushite konakatta no? - Why didn’t you come?)
[translate:猫が好きです。] (Neko ga suki desu. - I like cats.)
[translate:机の上に本があります。] (Tsukue no ue ni hon ga arimasu. - There is a book on the desk.)
[translate:新しい車がほしいです。] (Atarashii kuruma ga hoshii desu. - I want a new car.)
[translate:部屋に猫がいます。] (Heya ni neko ga imasu. - There is a cat in the room.)

Particles.meaning: Had better, it'd be better to, should
Particles.example: [translate:早く寝たほうがいいです。] (Hayaku neta hou ga ii desu. - You should go to bed early.)

I-Adjectives.example: [translate:彼がいちばん速い。] (Kare ga ichiban hayai. - He is the fastest.)
[translate:いっしょに行きましょう。] (Issho ni ikimashou. - Let's go together.)
[translate:いつも学校に行きます。] (Itsumo gakkou ni ikimasu. - I always go to school.)

I-Adjectives.point: じゃない / ではない
I-Adjectives.meaning: To not be; am not, is not, are not
I-Adjectives.example: [translate:彼は学生じゃない。] (Kare wa gakusei janai. - He is not a student.)
[translate:これはペンですか？] (Kore wa pen desu ka? - Is this a pen?)
[translate:水かお茶を飲みます。] (Mizu ka ocha o nomimasu. - I drink water or tea.)
[translate:忙しいから行けません。] (Isogashii kara ikemasen. - I can't go because I'm busy.)

I-Adjectives.meaning: The way of doing something; how to do
I-Adjectives.example: [translate:使いかたを教えて。] (Tsukaikata o oshiete. - Please teach me how to use it.)
[translate:疲れたけど、頑張る。] (Tsukareta kedo, ganbaru. - I'm tired, but I will do my best.)
[translate:忙しいけれども行きます。] (Isogashii keredomo ikimasu. - I'm busy, but I will go.)
[translate:まだ終わっていません。] (Mada owatte imasen. - I have not finished yet.)
[translate:五時まで勉強します。] (Goji made benkyou shimasu. - I study until 5 o'clock.)
[translate:ご飯の前に手を洗います。] (Gohan no mae ni te o araimasu. - I wash my hands before a meal.)
[translate:映画を見ませんか？] (Eiga o mimasen ka? - Shall we watch a movie?)

I-Adjectives.meaning: Shall I...? Used to offer help
I-Adjectives.example: [translate:手伝いましょうか？] (Tetsudaimashou ka? - Shall I help you?)
[translate:私も行きます。] (Watashi mo ikimasu. - I will go too.)
[translate:もう食べました。] (Mou tabemashita. - I already ate.)

Na-Adjectives.meaning: Sentence-ending particle for emotion or confirmation
Na-Adjectives.example: [translate:いい天気だなあ。] (Ii tenki da naa. - It's nice weather, isn't it?)
[translate:宿題をしないで遊んだ。] (Shukudai o shinaide asonda. - I played without doing homework.)
[translate:ここに入らないでください。] (Koko ni hairanaide kudasai. - Please don't enter here.)
[translate:行かなくてもいいです。] (Ikanakute mo ii desu. - You don't have to go.)

Na-Adjectives.point: なくちゃ / なくてはいけない / なければならない
Na-Adjectives.example: [translate:宿題をしなくちゃいけない。] (Shukudai o shinakucha ikenai. - I have to do my homework.)
[translate:医者になりました。] (Isha ni narimashita. - I became a doctor.)

Na-Adjectives.meaning: To explain something or show emphasis
Na-Adjectives.example: [translate:遅れたんです。] (Okureta n desu. - I am late (explaining).)
[translate:いい天気ですね。] (Ii tenki desu ne. - It's nice weather, isn't it?)
[translate:学校に行きます。] (Gakkou ni ikimasu. - I go to school.)
[translate:友達に会いに行きます。] (Tomodachi ni ai ni ikimasu. - I go to meet a friend.)
[translate:コーヒーにします。] (Kouhii ni shimasu. - I'll have coffee.)
[translate:学校にえ行く。] (Gakkou ni e iku. - I'm going toward school.)
[translate:彼の本です。] (Kare no hon desu. - It's his book.)
[translate:困ったのです。] (Komatta no desu. - I'm troubled (explaining).)

Na-Adjectives.meaning: To be bad at doing something
Na-Adjectives.example: [translate:泳ぐのが下手です。] (Oyogu no ga heta desu. - I'm bad at swimming.)

Na-Adjectives.meaning: To be good at doing something
Na-Adjectives.example: [translate:料理するのが上手です。] (Ryouri suru no ga jouzu desu. - I'm good at cooking.)
[translate:走るのが好きです。] (Hashiru no ga suki desu. - I like running.)

Na-Adjectives.point: A の 中で A が いちばん
Na-Adjectives.meaning: Out of this group, A is best
Na-Adjectives.example: [translate:友達の中で太郎が一番です。] (Tomodachi no naka de Tarou ga ichiban desu. - Tarou is the best among friends.)
[translate:雨なので行きません。] (Ame na node ikimasen. - I won't go because it is raining.)
[translate:ご飯を食べます。] (Gohan o tabemasu. - I eat rice.)
[translate:水をください。] (Mizu o kudasai. - Please give me water.)
[translate:雨でした。しかし、楽しかったです。] (Ame deshita. Shikashi, tanoshikatta desu. - It rained. However, it was fun.)
[translate:食べすぎました。] (Tabesugimashita. - I ate too much.)

Na-Adjectives.point: た こと が ある
Na-Adjectives.example: [translate:日本に行ったことがあります。] (Nihon ni itta koto ga arimasu. - I have been to Japan.)
[translate:映画を見たいです。] (Eiga o mitai desu. - I want to watch a movie.)

Na-Adjectives.meaning: Do such things as A and B
Na-Adjectives.example: [translate:本を読んだり、音楽を聞いたりします。] (Hon o yondari, ongaku o kiitari shimasu. - I do things like read books and listen to music.)
[translate:ドアが開けてあります。] (Doa ga akete arimasu. - The door has been opened.)
[translate:勉強しています。] (Benkyou shiteimasu. - I am studying.)
[translate:食べてから勉強します。] (Tabete kara benkyou shimasu. - I study after eating.)
[translate:見てください。] (Mite kudasai. - Please look.)

Na-Adjectives.point: て は いけない
Na-Adjectives.meaning: Must not do, may not, cannot
Na-Adjectives.example: [translate:ここでたばこを吸ってはいけません。] (Koko de tabako o sutte wa ikemasen. - You must not smoke here.)
[translate:入ってもいいですか。] (Haitte mo ii desu ka. - May I come in?)
[translate:友達と話します。] (Tomodachi to hanashimasu. - I talk with a friend.)
[translate:学校へ行くとき、雨が降っていました。] (Gakkou e iku toki, ame ga futte imashita. - It was raining when I went to school.)
[translate:とても暑いです。] (Totemo atsui desu. - It is very hot.)
[translate:日本へ行くつもりです。] (Nihon e iku tsumori desu. - I plan to go to Japan.)
[translate:私は学生です。] (Watashi wa gakusei desu. - I am a student.)
[translate:猫は犬より小さいです。] (Neko wa inu yori chiisai desu. - Cats are smaller than dogs.)

Na-Adjectives.point: は どう です か
Na-Adjectives.example: [translate:日本はどうですか？] (Nihon wa dou desu ka? - How is Japan?)
[translate:りんごやバナナを食べます。] (Ringo ya banana o tabemasu. - I eat apples and bananas, among other things.)
[translate:これは美味しいよ。] (Kore wa oishii yo. - This is tasty, you know.)

Na-Adjectives.meaning: A is more than B (emphasizing comparison)
Na-Adjectives.example: [translate:映画より本のほうが好きです。] (Eiga yori hon no hou ga suki desu. - I like books more than movies.)
